en: I always hang out with friends on Fridays, since I have the next day off.
zh: 我周五总是和朋友一起出去玩，因为第二天我休息。

en: Taiwan is preparing itself for a Chinese invasion.
zh: 台湾正在为中国大陆的入侵做准备。

en: I also work on Sundays.
I work on Sundays, too.
I've taken medicine, so I'm OK now.
zh: 我吃过药了，所以现在没事了。

en: I've taken medicine, so I'm fine now.
I'm a very slower walker.
My house is small and cramped.
I hate cleaning and doing laundry.
zh: 我讨厌打扫卫生和洗衣服。

en: Are you still half asleep?
I'll do that work by myself.
The flowers died from over-fertilization.
zh: 这些花因为施肥过多枯死了。

en: If you open the windows, bugs will come in.
zh: 要是开着窗户，虫子会进来的。

en: If you open the window, bugs will come in.
zh: 如果你把窗户打开，虫子会进来的。

en: If you open the windows, insects will come in.
zh: 要是开着窗户，昆虫会飞进来的。

en: If you open the window, insects will come in.
zh: 如果你把窗户打开，昆虫会飞进来的。

en: There's a witch living in Apartment 301.
All meetings are open to the public.
zh: 所有会议都对公众开放。

en: I'll never do this kind of thing again for as long as I live.
zh: 我这辈子再也不会做这种事了。

en: I'm kind of tired of it.
I'm kind of tired of this.
